title: My iPod is dead
body: And four posts shall follow: Tuesday: When will the Moxie be open? Wednesday: D-Cinema and the Cinnamonettes Thursday: Windows are the eyes to the sole proprietorship... or LLC Friday: The rash isn't getting any SMALLER! Also: Sears is having a week-long refrigeration sale, so I bought an all-fridge for the theater.
author: Dan

comments.author: whitty
comments.body: woo!  Something to look forward to while pretending to work!

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: what happened to your ipod?  didn't you have like three anyway?

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: You should go to one of those free ipod sites. It only takes 400 forms to fill out and only 20 subscriptions to annoying things you don't need and then after that all you have to do is get 25 friends to sign up and do everything you just did and THEN you get a FREE IPOD!

comments.author: Matt L.
comments.body:
*joins Brian in weeping for iPod*

Though, it was used on Windows, so maybe it is in a better place now ;)

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body: either way it was probably used on itunes.. which is one of the worst media programs ive ever seen ... luckily i learned how to bypass itunes :-)

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: Hey, waaaaaait a second here.  Is Sears local?

comments.author: nicholas
comments.body: does your RSS feed feature only post Titles so we're guaranteed to visit the site to read? hmm? hmm? and i want to know what happened too!

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: My iPod's hard drive went tits up. Not to worry, I have an expanded warranty, so I should be getting a new one soon. This will be my 3rd REPLACED iPod.

comments.author: Nicki J
comments.body: Hey Hey. Guess What? You do live down the street from my step-grandma. How cool is that? We're like.. neighbors. Almost. When I actually go visit her.. I'm such a horrible grandkid. :(

comments.author: Jed
comments.body: If the Ipod people give you a hassle about the warranty I will totally "take care of" Jobs. That guy kinda rubs me wrong anyway.

comments.author: Evan Erwin
comments.body:
Nicki J sucks at family contact, film at 11.

Dan needs his 3RD DAMN IPOD (aka "Why don't you just use that for music instead of whatever you're doing with it."), film at 11:01.

I desperately hang onto the thin comic thread in this post, film at 11:02.

comments.author: J.R.
comments.body: I bet it couldn't handle life anymore after I kicked it's ass in 90's music trivia

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Screw iPods. Get a Creative Zen player. That's what I have. It works like a charm.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Dan's ipod just has more GBs than he can handle. Mine works fine. And so does Bogart's.
